item.description: A list of MSDA full-time faculty

item.title: Easy pie charts and donut charts with ggforce
item.dc:creator: Ashwin Malshe
item.description: I make pie charts and donut charts in ggplot2 using a combination of a bar plot and polar coordinates. This works fine but polar coordinates prevent using any other geoms or annotations that need Cartesian coordinates. For example, annoatation_raster doesn't work with polar coordinates. ggforce solves this issue.

item.title: Donut Chart and Geofacets with Images
item.dc:creator: Ashwin Malshe
item.description: In this post, I recreate the donut chart overlaid on geo facets. Based on a friend's feedback, I now add pictures of winners of each state.

item.title: Persistence in Mutual Fund Performance
item.dc:creator: Ashwin Malshe
item.description: In this article, I reproduce Figure 1 from Mark Carhart's classic 1997 Journal of Finance article titled "On Persistence in Mutual Fund Performance". The visualizations are created using highcharter and echarts4r packages. It is an interactive bar plot that shows that there is a very low persistence in the mutual fund performance.

item.title: Donut Chart and Geofacets
item.dc:creator: Ashwin Malshe
item.description: How to combine a donut chart with geofacets in R.

item.title: Mapping Election Win Probabilities
item.dc:creator: Ashwin Malshe
item.description: I show how to create a election map using ggplot2

item.title: Welcome to R Data Visualization

item.description: Welcome to my new blog, R Data Visualization. I hope youe enjoy the code and visualizations!
